title: MLLM Pretraining with Event Semantic Structures

definitions.Structured Alignment: Aligning text and image event graphs to a common structure.
definitions.Sinkhorn Knopp algorithm: A method for approximating optimal transport.

summary: The slide discusses MLLM Pretraining with Event Semantic Structures, focusing on Structured Alignment via Optimal Transport. It defines a cost matrix, sets an optimization goal to minimize transport distance, and describes the Sinkhorn Knopp algorithm for approximating optimal transport. The slide also includes a visual representation of event graphs and a mathematical formula for the optimization process.
